title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2282/79 of 17 October 1979 on the classification of goods under subheading 55.09 A I of the Common Customs Tariff
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2282/79  of 17 October 1979  on the classification of goods under subheading 55.09 A I of the Common Customs Tariff
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Lengths of absorbent cotton fabric (known as "gauze"), not impregnated or coated with pharmaceutical substances, 100 m long and 0 765 m wide, concertinafolded, individually wrapped and labelled, shall be classified in the Common Customs Tariff under subheading:
55.09 Other woven fabrics of cotton:
A. Containing 85 % or more by weight of cotton:
I. Of a width of less than 85 cm.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the eighth day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 October 1979.
For the Commission
Ătienne DAVIGNON
